VIII.iv.4.B.4.d
.
SMC Under PL 97-66
PL 97-66
, effective October 1, 1981, elevated the level of SMC for
L/LOU of both hands from
38 U.S.C. 1114(l)
to
38 U.S.C. 1114(m)
, and
L/LOU of both arms at levels, or with complications, preventing natural elbow action with prosthesis in place from
38 U.S.C. 1114(m)
to
38 U.S.C. 1114(n)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
